text: A wolf that had been bitten by dogs, lay on the floor all hurt. Seeing that he could not find food in this situation, he asked a sheep passing by to bring him some water from the nearby river. "If you bring me water to drink", he said, "I will take care of my own food. "If I bring you water to drink, " the sheep replied", I will attend your dinner myself. The proposals of evildoers are never innocent.
title: El lobo herido y la oveja
author: nan Esopo
